content: Hey, can you tell me the, what is React Native?
React Native es un framework para desarrollar aplicaciones móviles multiplataforma. ¡Interesante y útil!
Hello, can you tell me about what is React Native?
Hello Shaun! React Native is a framework for developing cross-platform mobile applications. Did you know Spain has the world's third-largest number of UNESCO World Heritage Sites?
Can you tell me about what is JavaScript?
JavaScript is a programming language used to make websites interactive. You may want to learn "variable" next.
